text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Happy birthday, Pokke-kun! 
I've specially prepared a『Lovingly 
Crafted 100% Sincere Parfait』for you!

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
…Nah, I'm good. You're gonna 
sneak in some crazy stuff in that 
parfait, right?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Now this is unexpected. I don't mind 
making it from scratch right before 
your eyes though?

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Like filling a glass with ice 
cream, whipped cream, and topping 
it off with a cherry yourself?

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
What the hell… that sounds super 
fun and rare coming from you!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
Pokke-san, it's a trap… 
You'd best decline. If you want a 
parfait, I'll get you one as a gift…

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
I mean, I can just not eat it if it's 
sus! Let's see what kinda parfait 
Tachyon's gonna make, Cafe!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Exactly! Feel free to verify my 
『sincerity』 with your very 
own eyes.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
Alright, let's go already! 
Parfait～♪ Parfait～♪ 
Tachyon's Par～fait～♪
